Public Member Functions

Alaris.Irc.IParser Interface Reference

Classes should implement this Interface in order to act as custom parsers for the raw messages received from IRC servers. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

bool CanParse (string line)
 Before a message is passed to the custom parser the Connection will check if the IRC message is the right kind.
void Parse (string message)
 Send the raw IRC message to this custom parser. This consumes the message and it will not be processed by the default or any other custom parsers after this one.

Detailed Description

Classes should implement this Interface in order to act as custom parsers for the raw messages received from IRC servers.

Member Function Documentation

bool Alaris.Irc.IParser.CanParse ( string  line  ) 

Before a message is passed to the custom parser the Connection will check if the IRC message is the right kind.

Parameters:
line The raw message from the IRC server.
Returns:
True if this parser can process the message.
void Alaris.Irc.IParser.Parse ( string  message  ) 

Send the raw IRC message to this custom parser. This consumes the message and it will not be processed by the default or any other custom parsers after this one.

Parameters:
message The raw message from the IRC server.
